item.title: Dyson's latest Pure Cool fans also function as air purifiers
item.description: Dyson has introduced the Dyson Pure Cool purifying fans, which leverage the company’s expertise in airflow, filtration, and electronics to address indoor air pollution and purify entire rooms. Dyson first entered the purifying fan market in 2015, responding to the growing global concern of indoor air pollution. Dyson points out that we breathe mostly indoor air, which can contain invisible, microscopic particles. Urban pollution, particulate matter, and pollen can infiltrate indoor spaces like offices, mix with pollutants from sources like cleaning products, and become trapped.
